item.title: Government shutdown averted after Senate passes bipartisan House stopgap funding bill
item.description: President Biden is expected to sign the bill Saturday.

item.title: Dow closes nearly 500 points higher on cooler inflation data, but index posts third straight losing week: Live updates
item.description: All three major averages posted weekly losses despite seeing a rebound in Friday's session.

item.title: Jim Cramer explains how to spot 'exquisite moments' like Friday's session
item.description: CNBC's Jim Cramer reviewed Friday's market action, dubbing the session an "exquisite moment."

item.title: Vehicle plows into crowded Christmas market in Germany, killing 2 and injuring dozens
item.description: A short video of the incident posted on X and geolocated to the city of Magdeburg in eastern Germany showed a vehicle speeding through a large group o...

item.title: Elon Musk endorses far-right Alternative for Germany party in upcoming election
item.description: While he gains power in the incoming Trump administration, Elon Musk is using his influence elsewhere, endorsing a far-right party in Germany.
